body:
Add oneAPI packages from the 2021.3 release

I did manual checks of style checking and oneapi-tests on the local machine.
oneapi-test CI results: https://github.com/DanVev/oneapi-spack-tests/actions

Included a quick fix for correct ICX compiler version parsing. 
FYI: @rscohn2
title: Integrate 2021.3 oneAPI release to Spack
